summary:
Hi

Just a ENB passing through... hope u guys enjoy! <3
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia][size=3][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/83457-0-1493026626.jpg[/img][/size][size=5]Hi! xD  [url=http://imgur.com/esiD21V]:)[/url]
Im peregrine and i bring to you guys a very nice enb, based on [b]Low End[/b] pc´s![/size]









[size=6]Installation:[/size][/font] 
[size=5]1)[/size] Download the latest version of enbseries here: http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.html
      copy and paste everything for the WrapperVersion in your skyrim folder. 

[size=5]2)[/size]After that, download my file and copy and paste everything inside of ''peregrine enb'' to your Skyrim folder. 

[size=5]3)[/size]Add this to your [Display] option in "SkyrimPrefs.ini" but if you already have it just change the 0 to 1.

   bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
   bTreesReceiveShadows=1
   bDrawLandShadows=1
   bShadowsOnGrass=1

[size=5]4)[/size] Active all .esp files


[size=5]5)[/size] [b]u are good to go![/b] xD 

[size=5]6) [/size]You [b][size=4]NEED[/size][/b] this mod to have a better view: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58212/?



----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


[size=5]Instalação em Português! 
1) [/size][size=2]Baixe a última versão do enbseries aqui: http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.html
[/size]       Copie e cole tudo que está dentro da pasta WrapperVersion no diretório do seu skyrim.

[size=5]2)[/size]   Depois disso, baixe meu arquivo e copie e cole tudo dentro da pasta ''peregrine enb'' para o diretório do seu Skyrim. 


[size=5]3) [/size]  Adiciona essas linhas para a categoria [Display] no seu ''SkyrimPrefs.ini'' mas, se as mesmas já existirem apenas mude o valor de 0 para 1.


      bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
      bTreesReceiveShadows=1
      bDrawLandShadows=1
      bShadowsOnGrass=1   

[size=5]4) [/size]Ative todos os arquivos .esp


[size=5]5)[/size] Perfeitamente instalado! xD


[size=5]6) [/size]Você [size=6]PRECISA[/size] desse mod para ter uma visão melhor com o enb: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58212/?
 [size=5]
[/size]

[b][size=3]Credits:[/size][/b]
Like i said before, this is my configuration of a mod that alredy exists! Link here:http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75056/?
author: Peregrine330
